intro: Erythropsis, commonly known as the red-leaf plant, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its distinctive red or purple foliage, which is often more pronounced in certain species. These plants are often cultivated for their ornamental value due to their striking leaf coloration.
